description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'TransactionList' that displays a list of financial transactions. It fetches transaction data from a provider, manages loading and empty states, and provides navigation to a CRUD screen for individual transactions.

classes.name: TransactionList
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of transactions with loading and empty states, enabling navigation to transaction CRUD operations.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for displaying the list of transactions, handling loading and empty states, and item interactions.
